Package com.g1.mychess.email.util

Class EmailContentBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.email.util.EmailContentBuilder
public class EmailContentBuilder extends Object
Utility class that provides methods for building email content for various purposes, such as verification emails, blacklist/whitelist notifications, password reset requests, and feedback/contact emails.

  • Method Details

    • buildVerificationEmailContent

      public static String buildVerificationEmailContent(String username, String verificationToken, String baseUrl)
      Builds the content for a verification email.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the recipient of the email.
      verificationToken - The token used for email verification.
      baseUrl - The base URL to which the verification token should be appended.
      Returns:
      A string containing the formatted verification email content.

    • buildBlacklistEmailContent

      public static String buildBlacklistEmailContent(String username, String reason, Long banDuration)
      Builds the content for a blacklist notification email.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the recipient of the email.
      reason - The reason for the blacklist.
      banDuration - The duration of the ban in hours.
      Returns:
      A string containing the formatted blacklist notification email content.

    • buildWhitelistEmailContent

      public static String buildWhitelistEmailContent(String username, String reason)
      Builds the content for a whitelist notification email.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the recipient of the email.
      reason - The reason for being whitelisted.
      Returns:
      A string containing the formatted whitelist notification email content.

    • buildContactUsEmailContent

      public static String buildContactUsEmailContent(String name, String email, String message)
      Builds the content for a "Contact Us" feedback email.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the person submitting feedback.
      email - The email address of the person submitting feedback.
      message - The content of the feedback message.
      Returns:
      A string containing the formatted "Contact Us" email content.

    • buildPasswordResetEmailContent

      public static String buildPasswordResetEmailContent(String username, String resetToken, String baseUrl)
      Builds the content for a password reset email.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the recipient of the email.
      resetToken - The token used for password reset.
      baseUrl - The base URL to which the reset token should be appended.
      Returns:
      A string containing the formatted password reset email content.

    • buildMatchReminderEmailContent

      public static String buildMatchReminderEmailContent(String tournamentName, LocalDateTime scheduledTime)
